name: Wet Treasure - GWJ41
description:
Wet Treasure was made for the Godot Wild Jam #41 (a 9-day game jam), with the theme Ocean. I started late so it was a 5-day jam for me.

The wildcards (optional challenges) used were:
- Sound of Y'All - All sounds in-game are made with your mouth
- It's Treeson Then - Include your favorite* quote or pun in game

* Not exactly my favourite, but one I like which fits.

You are a scuba-diving treasure hunter, and you've almost found the motherlode! Your ticket to early retirement lies somewhere on the sea bed...

You have to find four treasures in the scenario, pick them up and bring to your boat. 

This is a hard game: the controls are somewhat realistic and you have to control your buoyancy while avoiding the pressure in your ears or problems with nitrogen decompression in your blood!
